title: SOP-006 Creation and SOP Internal Consistency

comment: NON-COMPLIANT: Character encoding defect detected. The 'Performed By - Date' field in EI-1, EI-2, and EI-3 tables displays as 'Performed By \ufffd Date' (replacement character). This formatting error must be corrected before approval. All other content is compliant: (1) Frontmatter title verified: 'SOP-006 Creation and SOP Internal Consistency', (2) Description, Rationale, and Testing Summary present per SOP-002 Section 6, (3) Execution items properly structured per SOP-004, (4) No placeholder content found, (5) Line number references verified against effective SOPs. No Technical Units required - this is a QMS procedural CR.

COMPLIANT. Encoding defect resolved - 'Performed By / Date' now displays correctly in all three EIs. Full verification: (1) Frontmatter title: 'SOP-006 Creation and SOP Internal Consistency', (2) Description, Rationale, Testing Summary present per SOP-002 Section 6, (3) Execution items EI-1, EI-2, EI-3 properly structured per SOP-004, (4) No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX), (5) Consistent formatting throughout. No Technical Units assigned - QMS procedural change requires QA oversight only. Recommend for pre-approval.

POST-REVIEW COMPLIANT. All SOP-002 Section 7.3 requirements verified: (1) Execution Complete: EI-1 Pass, EI-2 Pass, EI-3 Pass - all tasks completed as planned, (2) No VARs required - all tasks passed, (3) Documentation Approved: SOP-006 v1.0 EFFECTIVE, SOP-001 v12.0 EFFECTIVE, SOP-005 v3.0 EFFECTIVE - all three documents reviewed and approved by QA during this session, (4) Evidence Documented: All EIs have detailed Execution Summary entries with document versions and dates. revision_summary traceability verified: SOP-001 and SOP-005 reference CR-015, SOP-006 uses 'Initial creation' per v0.1 exception. Testing criteria from Section 4 verified during individual document reviews. Recommend for post-approval.
